snippet.title: WARRIORS OROCHI 4 Ultimate - Game Feature Highlight
snippet.description:
WARRIORS OROCHI 4 Ultimate launches February 14, 2020 on the PS4®, the Nintendo Switch™, the Xbox One, and digitally on Windows PC via Steam®!

The Greek god, Hades; the heroic warrior, Achilles; and KOEI TECMO’s iconic ninja, Ryu Hayabusa join a cast of over 170 playable characters in the thrilling new entry to the popular ‘1 vs. 1,000’ hack-and-slash series where heroes from DYNASTY WARRIORS, SAMURAI WARRIORS, and the gods of ancient history band together seeking the truth behind the powerful forces who have transported them to wage war in this mysterious new world.
